about_the_game:
Reconnaissance operatives infiltrated a corporate building and extracted electronics and files encrypted with 56-bit DES. Items were handed over to you, the cryptanalyst. Your mission is to decrypt the files.

Key Features
  • Real-world cryptanalysis, meticulously simulates techniques on the full 16-round encryption
  • Computer aided mathematics, computer algebra system, facilitates the manipulation of mathematical expressions in a couple of clicks
  • Index access to each cryptanalytic problem
  • Statistics and algebra
  • Differential cryptanalysis
  • Impossible differential cryptanalysis
  • Linear cryptanalysis
  • Retro-style roleplay simulation of a cryptanalyst career in signals intelligence
detailed_description:
Reconnaissance operatives infiltrated a corporate building and extracted electronics and files encrypted with 56-bit DES. Items were handed over to you, the cryptanalyst. Your mission is to decrypt the files.

Key Features
  • Real-world cryptanalysis, meticulously simulates techniques on the full 16-round encryption
  • Computer aided mathematics, computer algebra system, facilitates the manipulation of mathematical expressions in a couple of clicks
  • Index access to each cryptanalytic problem
  • Statistics and algebra
  • Differential cryptanalysis
  • Impossible differential cryptanalysis
  • Linear cryptanalysis
  • Retro-style roleplay simulation of a cryptanalyst career in signals intelligence

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 minimum
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: Mouse/trackpad required. Keyboard optional.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit OSX
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 minimum
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: Mouse/trackpad required. Keyboard optional.

name: Operation Deep Magic: Cryptanalysis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit (Windows 7, 8, 10)
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 minimum
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: Mouse/trackpad required. Keyboard optional. VC++ 2019 redistributables.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Reconnaissance operatives infiltrated a corporate building and extracted electronics and files encrypted with 56-bit DES. Items were handed over to you, the cryptanalyst. Your mission is to decrypt the files.
